issue.title: [Java] Refactor metrics system
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-385](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-385). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Java Arrow has some support for metrics (backed by yammers metrics), but by default, no reporter is registered. Also, it means that Arrow is tied to a specific metric system.

I suggest to replace the metric systen with a listener on allocation so that user can use it with the metrics library of its choice
